Ummm....dude, Autoguns can't hit the ship, it'd be really hard, seeing as m=
ost pop out from the ship, meaning if they were to hit it they'd have to tu=
rn around completely, which I don't think they can do, but I didn't design =
the ship, so, talk to Kinger.

 Deepblue then licks up all the chardonay that spilled when he smashed

t.
